subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The first day of the year used to be a daylong celebration of foo’ball in warm places, but the N.H.L. has played carpe diem by giving us steambreath under a gray sky.
snippet: The first day of the year used to be a daylong celebration of foo’ball in warm places, but the N.H.L. has played carpe diem by giving us steambreath under a gray sky.
